module.name: independent_property_representation
module.purpose:
This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module for the representatioon of the association of a representation to an independent property. That module enables, for example, to provide a diagram that represents the way to measure a particular property type.
This edition incorporates modifications to the previous edition listed below.
The following ARM EXPRESS declarations have been chaged:
Independent_property_representation.
The following ARM EXPRESS declarations have been removed:
USE FROM Foundation_representation_arm.
The following ARM EXPRESS declarations have been added:
USE FROM Property_assignment_arm.
In addition, modifications have been made to the EXPRESS-G diagrams to reflect and be consistent with the modifications of the ARM.
The following MIM EXPRESS declarations have been removed:
USE FROM Property_assignment_mim.
The following MIM EXPRESS declarations have been added:
USE FROM Foundation_representation_mim;
USE FROM Independent_property_mim;
USE FROM product_property_representation_schema (property_definition_representation)
Modifications made to the mapping specification of the following entity definitions (removed):
Independent_property_representation.rep.

inscope.li: association of representation with an independent property.

uof.name: Independent_Property_Representation
uof.description: The Independent_Property_Representation UoF enables the association of a representation with an independent property.
